name: euraflow-ozon-selector
description: EuraFlow OZON选品助手浏览器扩展

scripts.build: tsc && BUILD_MODE=production vite build && npm run pack
scripts.build:debug: tsc && BUILD_MODE=debug vite build && npm run pack:debug
scripts.pack: rm -f ../../../../../web/public/downloads/euraflow.zip && cd dist && zip -r ../../../../../../web/public/downloads/euraflow.zip manifest.json service-worker-loader.js assets/ src/ -x '*.map'
scripts.pack:debug: rm -f ../../../../../web/public/downloads/euraflow-debug.zip && cd dist && zip -r ../../../../../../web/public/downloads/euraflow-debug.zip manifest.json service-worker-loader.js assets/ src/ -x '*.map'
